# HorseCost.co.uk

> Free professional horse cost calculators for UK equestrians

## About
HorseCost provides accurate, UK-specific calculators to help horse owners budget for ownership costs. All pricing data is verified against current UK market rates and updated regularly.

## Main Calculators
- Annual Horse Cost Calculator: Comprehensive yearly ownership costs (£5,000-15,000+)
- Livery Cost Calculator: Compare full, part, DIY, grass livery options
- Horse Feed Calculator: Daily hay and hard feed requirements and costs
- Farrier Cost Calculator: Shoeing vs barefoot annual costs
- Vet Cost Estimator: Routine and emergency veterinary budgets
- Horse Insurance Calculator: Compare cover levels and premiums

## Key UK Horse Ownership Facts (2025)
- Average annual cost: £8,500
- Full livery: £400-700/month (all care included)
- Part livery: £250-400/month (shared care)
- DIY livery: £100-200/month (owner does all care)
- Grass livery: £60-120/month (field only)
- Farrier: £80-150 per visit, every 6-8 weeks
- Routine vet care: £300-500/year
- Insurance: £30-100/month depending on cover

## Livery Types Explained
- Full Livery: Complete care including feeding, turnout, mucking out
- Part Livery: Shared responsibilities between owner and yard
- DIY Livery: Owner provides all daily care, yard provides facilities
- Grass Livery: Field only, no stabling included
